Attributes.description: Hydrologic processes - weather, precipitation, infiltration, evaporation, snowmelt and runoff generation. Emphasis on quantitative techniques including: hydrograph analysis, reservoir and channel routing, statistical methods and design floods, hydrologic modelling.
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 1, Days: Wed Fri, Start Time: 15:00, End Time: 16:30, Building: Wesbrook, Room: 201
